content: Hi all, which FHIR resource can I use to map the fields in UB-04 claim form? Thanks in advance
Have you looked at the Claim resource? Would you be able to post a sample of the form?

Yes I have checked the claim resource but not all the fields in the form are matching with the resource. http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073520896/student_view0/simulated_ub-04_form_and_sample_claims.html. Please check the link.
Then you have to profile the claim resource to make it look like the UB-04.
